TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MemberDescriptor extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示一个类成员，例如某个属性或事件。

span.span: Represents a class member, such as a property or event.

summary.span: 这是一个抽象基类。

span.span: This is an abstract base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 和 类的基类。 is the base class for the and the classes. 类提供事件的说明， 类提供对属性的说明。The class provides a description of an event, and the class provides a description of a property. 此类定义用于访问其存储属性的属性和方法。This class defines properties and methods to access its stored attributes. 属性获取属性的集合。The property gets the collection of attributes. 、、和 属性检索这些特定属性的值。The , , , and properties retrieve the values of those specific attributes. 和 属性提供成员的名称。The and properties provide the name of the member. 还定义了 方法来比较此 。The also defines an method to compare this to another. > [!NOTE] > 通常，从 和 类（而不是从此类）继承。Typically, you inherit from the and classes, and not from this class. ## Examples 由于此类的大部分用法都将位于继承类 和 上，因此请参阅这些类中的示例。Since most of the usage of this class will fall on the inherited classes and , refer to the examples in these classes.

summary.span: 当在派生类中被重写时，将继承类的特性添加到父类中指定的特性列表。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, adds the attributes of the inheriting class to the specified list of attributes in the parent class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于重复的属性，将保留最后一个添加到列表中的属性。For duplicate attributes, the last one added to the list is kept. 具有特性的 创建一次。The with the attributes is created once. 如果列表中存在重复的属性，则只保存第一个实例;将从列表中删除所有后续的重复属性。If there are duplicate attributes in the list, only the first instance is saved; all subsequent duplicate attributes are removed from the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，返回值将与 `instance` 参数相同。Normally, the return value will be the same as the `instance` parameter. 如果另一个对象已与此实例相关联，或如果该实例为自定义类型描述符，则 方法可能返回不同的值。If another object has been associated with this instance, or if the instance is a custom type descriptor, the method may return a different value.
